content: "Create a stylized, cartoon-inspired portrait of an acrobat standing in a circus tent, holding his head in his hand and looking dejected. The acrobat should be depicted in a dynamic pose, with a colorful costume and exaggerated features. In the background, a bustling circus scene should be visible, with clowns, animals, and other performers going about their business. Use bold, vibrant colors and a detailed, realistic style to bring the character to life."
